author: Lauren Lavin
description: Humans, androids and even xenomorphs themselves are not spared as we break down the most iconic demises from the Alien movie franchise.
title: The 15 Best Deaths in the Alien Movies - IGN

author: Daniel Krupa
description: Director Ridley Scott takes the Alien franchise back to its horror roots while finally tackling some Prometheus' lingering questions.
title: Alien: Covenant Review - IGN
